record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 989
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 989 -- (House of Representatives - July 11, 2007)

[Page: H7623]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I rise to ask for unanimous consent to have my name removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 989.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Illinois?
